userCreations.description: A stunning Pattachitra scroll from Odisha, depicting a tale from the Ramayana with natural pigments on cloth.

userCreations.description: A rustic terracotta horse from Panchmura, Bengal, representing a timeless tradition of village pottery.

userCreations.description: A beautiful wall hanging featuring intricate Kalamkari art, hand-painted using a traditional pen with natural dyes.

userCreations.name: Dokra Brass Human Figurine
userCreations.description: A unique human figurine crafted using the ancient Dokra metal casting technique, which is over 4,000 years old.

userCreations.name: Madhubani Painted Coasters
userCreations.description: Set of 4 coasters, hand-painted with vibrant Madhubani art, depicting themes of nature and harmony.

userCreations.name: Bandhani Silk Scarf
userCreations.description: A luxurious silk scarf from Gujarat, adorned with intricate Bandhani tie-dye patterns in rich, vibrant colors.

userCreations.name: Banarasi Silk Saree
userCreations.description: An exquisite saree woven from fine silk with intricate gold and silver brocade or zari, from Varanasi.

userCreations.name: Pashmina Shawl
userCreations.description: An incredibly soft and warm shawl, hand-spun from the fleece of the Changthangi goat in Kashmir.

userCreations.name: Meenakari Enamel Necklace
userCreations.description: A vibrant necklace featuring Meenakari enameling, a technique of decorating metal with brilliant colors.

userCreations.name: Channapatna Wooden Toys
userCreations.description: A set of safe, eco-friendly wooden toys from Channapatna, colored with natural, non-toxic dyes.

userCreations.name: Kashmiri Hand-knotted Rug
userCreations.description: A luxurious, hand-knotted silk rug from Kashmir, known for its intricate designs and soft texture.

userCreations.name: Marble Dust Sculpture
userCreations.description: A detailed sculpture of a deity, crafted from marble dust and resin, finished to resemble pure marble.

userCreations.name: Tanjore Painting
userCreations.description: A classical South Indian painting style from Thanjavur, characterized by rich colors, gold foil, and glass bead inlays.

userCreations.name: Leather Mojari Shoes
userCreations.description: Handcrafted leather footwear from Rajasthan, embroidered with intricate thread work.

featuredArt.title: The Art of Pattachitra
featuredArt.description: Discover the ancient art of scroll painting from Odisha, where every brushstroke tells a story from mythology.

products.name: Hand-carved Wooden Elephant
products.description: A magnificent elephant, hand-carved from a single block of sustainable mango wood, showcasing intricate details. This piece is a testament to the artisan's skill, passed down through generations.
products.process: Hand-carved by master artisans in Rajasthan using traditional tools and techniques.
products.story: This elephant was carved from a fallen mango tree in my village. It represents strength, wisdom, and good fortune, and I pour my heart into every detail to bring those qualities to life.

products.name: Blue Pottery Vase
products.description: A vibrant blue pottery vase from Jaipur, featuring traditional floral motifs hand-painted by skilled artisans. The striking cobalt blue is derived from a special mixture of quartz stone powder, powdered glass, and other natural ingredients, making each vase a unique work of art.
products.process: Hand-thrown on the potter's wheel, hand-painted with natural pigments, and low-fired.
products.story: The motifs on this vase are inspired by the gardens of the Amer Fort. Each brushstroke is a memory of the vibrant flowers I saw there as a child. It's a piece of my history.

products.name: Pattachitra Scroll Painting
products.description: A stunning Pattachitra scroll from Odisha, depicting a tale from the Ramayana with natural pigments on cloth. The intricate details and vibrant colors are achieved through a meticulous process of painting with fine brushes made from squirrel hair.
products.material: Tussar silk cloth, natural mineral and plant-based pigments.
products.process: The canvas is prepared with tamarind seed paste. The painting is done with fine brushes and natural colors, followed by a lacquer finish for longevity.
products.story: This scroll tells the story of Sita's abduction, a powerful moment in the Ramayana. I chose this scene to capture the emotion and drama of our epic tales for a new generation.

products.name: Terracotta Horse
products.description: A rustic terracotta horse from Panchmura, Bengal, representing a timeless tradition of village pottery. These horses are known for their unique, elongated necks and are traditionally offered to local deities. Each piece is handcrafted and fired in a traditional kiln.
products.process: Shaped by hand and with simple tools, sun-dried, and then fired in a traditional kiln, giving it its characteristic earthy color.
products.story: The Bankura horse is a symbol of devotion in my community. We have been making them for centuries as offerings. This horse carries the prayers and hopes of my ancestors.

reviews.name: Aarav Sharma
reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning craftsmanship. The details are even more incredible in person. A true masterpiece!

reviews.name: Saanvi Patel
reviews.comment: Beautiful piece, but the shipping took a bit longer than expected. The art itself is worth the wait though.

reviews.name: Vivaan Gupta
reviews.comment: I bought this as a gift and it was a huge hit. The story behind the piece makes it so special. Highly recommend!
